applicationcontext.name: ApplicationContext
applicationcontext.description: Use this interface to retrieve application context information, such as the application version or URL.

canvaslifecyclehandler.name: CanvasLifecycleHandler
canvaslifecyclehandler.description: Implement this interface to control context information and add custom behavior during the application render phase.

canvasrenderexception.name: CanvasRenderException
canvasrenderexception.description: Use this class in your implementation of Canvas.CanvasLifecycleHandler.onRender(renderContext).

contexttypeenum.name: ContextTypeEnum
contexttypeenum.description: Describes context data that can be excluded from canvas app context data. You specify which context types to exclude in the excludeContextTypes() method in your CanvasLifecycleHandler implementation

environmentcontext.name: EnvironmentContext
environmentcontext.description: Use this interface to retrieve environment context information, such as the app display location or the configuration parameters.

rendercontext.name: RenderContext
rendercontext.description: A wrapper interface that is used to retrieve application and environment context information.

test.name: Test
test.description: Contains methods for automated testing of your Canvas classes.
